result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for tracking notifications and events through HTTP requests.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating tracking functionality in separate files for client implementation and data models.

internal/infras/tracking/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for tracking notifications via HTTP requests.

internal/infras/tracking/models.go.purpose: Defines the TrackRequest struct for tracking events.
